Name: Metropolitan (1993)
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized orange zest twist (flamed).
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: A Cosmopolitan with more than a hint of berry fruit.
History: Created in 1993 by Chuck Coggins at Marion's Continental Restaurant & Lounge, New York City, using the recently launched Absolut Kurant Vodka . Incidentally, Marion's opened in 1950 by fashion model Marion Nagy, who came to the States after seeking asylum while swimming for Hungary in the Paris Peace Games after WWII.
Nutrition: One serving of Metropolitan (1993) contains 149 calories
